text: When I saw the first clip from IT before Annabelle : Creation last month, one thing was immediately clear to me : Bill Skarsgård was born to play Pennywise the clown. Now that I ’ ve seen Andy Muschietti ’ s IT in its entirety, I can confidently say that the new Pennywise is one of the best movie monsters since the ’ 80s, driven by a gripping performance from Skarsgård that is downright Oscar - worthy. Comparisons have been made to Heath Ledger ’ s portrayal of The Joker, and you won ’ t find me disagreeing. Like Ledger, Skarsgård took an iconic character and managed to make it even more iconic.
